channel.title: 317 Delta How do you make it so only donators can wear an item
channel.description: How do you make it so only donators can wield partyhats. Pretty straight up.

item.title: 317 Delta How do you make it so only donators can wear an item
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

look for this

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

under it put this

if(wearID == #### && playerIsMember == 0){
sendMessage(“You must be a Donor to wield this item.”);
return false;
}

party hat id’s are 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048 Cheers.

Read full topic
item.source: 317 Delta How do you make it so only donators can wear an item
